猘字的基本解释

猘
zhì
狂犬，疯狗：“夫猘噬固能伤人，而豺声亦当自毙。”
疯狂的：“狂马不触木，猘狗不自投于水。”
凶猛；勇猛：凶猘。“曹公闻策平定江南，意甚难之，常呼‘猘儿难与争锋也。’”

猘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》居例切，去祭，見。］
［《集韻》征例切，去祭，章。］
(1)谓狗疯狂。参见“猘犬”、“猘狗”。
(2)狂犬、猛犬。比喻狂暴之徒。
(3)凶猛貌。
(4)指猖狂作乱。

猘字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　猘； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页713第21
〔古文〕?【集韻】征例切，音制。本作狾。或作瘈。詳狾字註。　又【集韻】【韻會】?居例切，音罽。義同。【淮南子·氾論訓】猘狗之驚，以殺子陽。【集韻】或作狾瘈?。　又【集韻】吉詣切，音計。或作狾。義同。

猘字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
猘字的起名意思

暂无。

rabid dog
Basic explanation of words
rabid dog
zhì
Rabid dog, mad dog: "The biting of a husband and a dog can hurt people, and the sound of a jackal is also self-destructive."
Crazy: "Crazy horses don't touch the wood, and pet dogs don't throw themselves into the water."
Fierce; brave: fierce. "Cao Gong heard the policy to pacify the south of the Yangtze River. It is very difficult to understand. He often calls "Rapids are difficult to fight for.""
rabid dog
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
["Guangyun" cuts the case, go to the festival, see. ]
["Ji Yun" sample cut, go to sacrifice, chapter. ]
(1) The dog is crazy. See "Rapid Dog", "Rapid Dog".
(2) Rabies and bulldogs. An analogy of a violent.
(3) Fierce appearance.
(4) Refers to rampant chaos.
rabid dog
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　猘; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 713 21
[Ancient text]? [Jiyun] Example cut, phonetic system. This is a scorpion. Or groggy. Detailed note of the word 狾.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Jueqie, Yinfeng. The same meaning. [Huainanzi·Fanlunxun] Rabid dogs are shocked to kill Ziyang. [Ji Yun] Or make a 狾瘈?.　 [Jiyun] Quijoe, sound meter. Or make a leap. The same meaning.
